# POS System Project Instructions

This is a Point of Sale (POS) system built with Next.js and React that integrates with Firebase for backend services. The system provides a modern tablet-style interface for retail operations.

## Project Structure
- Next.js application with React components
- Firebase integration for data management
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Modern POS interface with product catalog, shopping cart, and payment processing

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Implement responsive design for tablet and desktop use
- Follow Firebase best practices for data operations
- Maintain clean component architecture
- Use TypeScript for type safety
